semantics.label: transalte:: Enable book cover
semantics.description: transalte:: A cover that shows info regarding the book before access

fields.label: transalte:: Cover description
fields.description: transalte:: This text will be the description of your book.

fields.label: transalte:: Cover image
fields.description: transalte:: An optional background image for the introduction.

fields.label: transalte:: Cover image alternative text
fields.description: transalte:: An alternative text for the cover image

fields.label: transalte:: Display table of contents as default
fields.description: transalte:: When enabled the table of contents is showed when opening the book

fields.label: transalte:: Display Progress Indicators
fields.description: transalte:: When enabled there will be indicators per page showing the user if he is done with the page or not.

fields.label: transalte:: Enable automatic progress
fields.description: transalte:: If enabled a page without tasks is considered done when viewed. A page with tasks when all tasks are done. If disabled there will be a button at the bottom of every page for the user to click when done with the page.

fields.label: transalte:: Display summary
fields.description: transalte:: When enabled the user can see a summary and submit the progress/answers

semantics.label: transalte:: Translation for "@pages of @total completed" (@pages and @total will be replaced by actual values)
transalte:: Translation for "Navigate to the top"
transalte:: Translation for "I have finished this page"
semantics.default: transalte:: I have finished this page

semantics.label: transalte:: Page progress in book
semantics.description: transalte:: "@count" will be replaced by page count, and "@total" with the total number of pages

semantics.label: transalte:: Interaction progress
semantics.description: transalte:: "@count" will be replaced by interaction count, and "@total" with the total number of interactions

semantics.label: transalte:: Score
semantics.description: transalte:: "@score" will be replaced with current score, and "@maxscore" will be replaced with max achievable score

semantics.label: transalte:: Per page interactions completion
semantics.description: transalte:: "@left" will be replaced with remaining interactions, and "@max" will be replaced with total number of interactions on the page

semantics.label: transalte:: Translation for "You have not interacted with any pages."
semantics.default: transalte:: You have not interacted with any pages.

semantics.label: transalte:: Translation for "You have to interact with at least one page before you can see the summary."
semantics.default: transalte:: You have to interact with at least one page before you can see the summary.

semantics.label: transalte:: Translation for "Your answers are submitted for review!"
semantics.default: transalte:: Your answers are submitted for review!

fields.label: transalte:: Page progress textual alternative
fields.description: transalte:: An alternative text for the visual page progress. @page and @total variables available.

fields.label: transalte:: Label for expanding/collapsing navigation menu
